<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <citation>
        <option name="et-al-min" value="6"/>
        <option name="et-al-use-first" value="5"/>
        <layout delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="author">
                <name delimiter=", "/>
		        <name-part type="primary-key" text-case="uppercase"/>
		        <et-al term="and others" font-style="italic" prefix=" "/>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>

author.literal: Ministry of Fear, Loathing and Error

result: Пётр Ильич ЧАЙКОВСКИЙ, Rip van WINKLE, 我妻栄, Carl THUCYDIDES III, TOKUGAWA Ieyasu and others
